coreAtributes.authorTag: Stamped into back of the fins reads "FORGED AND SHARPENED BY TROOPS #P01-Y & #B100-M"
coreAtributes.name: Imperial Talon
coreAtributes.description: A pair of clawed gauntlets, Layered to provide as minimal protection possible in exchange for dexterity. Made by imperials to imitate the dragons of the cloudy stronghold. While you could claw with them, their use is probably better to grip into airship cables or drive blade handles.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unstrap and remove your Talons.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You tear [npc.name]'s Talons off of their hands, popping the straps.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] tears your Talons off of your hands, popping the straps.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] tears the Talons from [npc2.name]'s hands, popping the straps.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull and and strap up your Talons.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.name]'s Talons over their hands, and strap them up.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You shove [npc.name]'s hands into the Talons, and strap them in.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] pulls on and straps up their Talons.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] slides the Talons over your hands, and straps them up.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] shoves your hands into the Talons, and straps them in.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] pulls the Talons over [npc2.name]'s hands, and straps them up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] shoves [npc2.name]'s hands into the Talons, and straps them in.
